gggpIsokinetics
Class FunctionImpl

java.lang.Object
  gggpIsokinetics.FunctionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Function
public class FunctionImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Function

Class that offers a concrete implementation of the interface Function. The function's behavior is: FunctionImpl(f) = f operator increment. That is, the function applies over it the operator with increment. For example if operator is "+", the function returns: f + increment . It belongs to the Public API.

Author:
Jorge Couchet.
